title: You will be greeted by an open plan living/kitchen combo!
description:
1529 Green St is a beautiful and updated 1 bed, 1 bath condo located in the highly sought-after Fairmount/Art Museum area of Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. The unit features modern finishes, hardwood floors throughout, a spacious bedroom, and access to a private back patio. Upon entering the condo, you will be greeted by an open plan living/kitchen combo with contemporary cabinetry, a complementing backsplash, stainless steel appliances, an island, and a pantry for additional storage. The in-unit laundry is conveniently located here as well. The cozy living space has a fireplace that leads to a hallway where you can find the full bathroom and more storage space.The spacious bedroom features ample closet space, plenty of windows for natural light, and rear yard access. The location of this condo is truly amazing, as it is only a few blocks from the Roberto Clemente Park and a short distance to the Philadelphia Museum of Art, Whole Foods, Target, and all the fabulous restaurants, bars, and shops the area has to offer. For commuters, the Broad Street Line is only 1 block away, and 676 is less than a 3-minute drive. This adorable condo is perfect for those looking to embrace city life and enjoy all the amenities that the Fairmount/Art Museum area of Philadelphia has to offer. Schedule a showing today!

title: you will LOVE living on Iseminger!
description:
Situated on a quiet, sweet street in Washington Square West, 410 S Iseminger ticks all the boxes of trinity living. This two-bedroom, one-bathroom home features TWO outdoor spaces and has been beautifully updated for both modern comfort and historic preservation. Just through the front door, you’re greeted with a quaint living room with a well-maintained original fireplace and coat closet. Making your way downstairs, you’ll find the renovated kitchen with cellar door access to the street (for unloading groceries) and outdoor space. The kitchen has all new appliances, a new backsplash, and repointed exposed brick walls. The back patio is the perfect place to enjoy your morning coffee or work outside during a warm day. The first bedroom is found on the second floor of the home. Down the hall is the full bath featuring heated floors, a new toilet, and a new vanity. On the third floor of this trinity is the second bedroom with beautiful vaulted ceilings and exposed beams. Off of this bedroom is a little balcony. With two outdoor spaces, original hardwood floors, a basement for storage, central air, and close proximity to all your Center City favorites, you will LOVE living on Iseminger.

title: Completely redone both inside and out this picture perfect and turnkey
description: Can easily be a 2 bedroom! Completely redone both inside and out, this picture perfect and turnkey home has left not a single inch unimproved. From the moment you step inside, you are met with modern and tasteful upgrades and decor. Enjoy coffee on the covered front porch with the backdrop of stacked stone. Or, step inside to a space that's been opened up and finished to encourage entertaining and relaxing. Built-in seating sits in the dining room at the front of the house, where front yard views abound and there is plenty of seating for even large groups. Directly across from the dining area, the open kitchen provides it all: new stainless steel appliances, (Digital duel fuel stove with steam attachment) tile floors, solid Wolf cabinetry, granite counters, and a center island with microwave nook. The ample counter space and thoughtful layout will please even the most particular home chef. Down the tiled hall, find a conveniently located powder room and a bright, full custom cabinet laundry room with space-saving pocket door and 5 year old appliances. In the heart of the home, the dining space continues on to an open space, currently used as a billiards room, that opens via double glass doors to a well-placed and "sound proof" home office. Further back, the home gives way to voluminous vaulted ceilings in a grand living room space, where huge 7 ft windows & transoms let the sunlight in. One side is anchored by a full wall of built-in shelving and cabinet storage, complete with media hook up, while the other hosts a bar area with walnut countertop seating, pendant lighting, and a door to the floating deck - perfect for having friends and family over. The deck floats at the back corner of the home, offering a buffer on two sides and great views from there of the large, level, green backyard. Quietly tucked away down a hall beyond the dining room, Custom trim, CAT 6 wired,. and hard wired security system throughout. Spacious, airy, welcoming, and done with style - this home has it all! Don't wait!
